metadata.Title: CVE-2019-19269 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in tls_verify_crl in ProFTPD through 1.3.6b. Adereference of a NULL pointer may occur. This pointer is returned by theOpenSSL sk_X509_REVOKED_value() function when encountering an empty CRLinstalled by a system administrator. The dereference occurs when validatingthe certificate of a client connecting to the server in a TLS client/servermutual-authentication setup.

criterions.comment: proftpd-dfsg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
